snippet.title: Farming Simulator VR: Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
This is hands-on virtual farming: Farming Simulator VR is coming soon to Meta Quest. The standalone game will launch on February 28th and is available for pre-order today. 

🤓 More info on the blog!
►  https://www.farming-simulator.com/newsArticle.php?&news_id=588

👓 Farming Simulator VR Pre-order starts today! (7pm CET)
►  https://www.meta.com/experiences/quest/6951948781556245/

👉 Farming Simulator VR is a brand-new farming experience 
👉 Various field activities & crops to sow and harvest
👉 Greenhouse farming with more vegetables to choose from
👉 Real machines by renowned agricultural manufacturers
👉 Machine maintenance & repair in the workshop
👉 Additional satisfaction through power-washing



🛒 There's more in our shop!
► https://www.farming-simulator.com/buy-now.php

👨‍🌾 Learn how to play with the Farming Simulator Academy!
► https://farming-simulator.com/academy

🙌 Want more Farming Simulator?
► Farming Simulator Website: http://www.farming-simulator.com/ 
► Farming Simulator League (FSL): https://fsl.giants-software.com/
► Discord: https://discord.gg/giantssoftware
► Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/giants.farming.simulator
► Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/farmingsimulator/
► TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@farmingsimulator
► BlueSky: https://bsky.app/profile/farmingsim.bsky.social
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/farmingsim
► Twitter (FSL): https://twitter.com/FSLeSports
► Twitch English: https://twitch.tv/giantssoftware
► Twitch Deutsch: https://twitch.tv/giantssoftwarede
► WhatsApp: https://bit.ly/49aw4sI
